comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: Edinburgh is misspelled. Likely Grand Duchess Maria Alexandrovna of Russia, who was married to Alfred, Duke of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha (also the Duke of Edinburgh) en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grand_Duchess_Maria_Alexandrovna_of...

comment.author: 41907725@N06
comment._content: This photo could not be made in 1910-15, respectively. Grand Duchess Maria Alexandrovna is there a maximum age of 45.

comment.author: 41907725@N06
comment._content: Especially in the lower left corner of the picture is visible date - 1901 ..

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: She was in the news in late 1914 because her daughter Marie became Queen of Romania on the accession to the throne of her husband Ferdinand.

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: Thanks for spotting the typo in the title and for the additional information.  We correct the title.
